title: Special Science Report 1192
description: Faced with the task of disproving the existence of vampires, Herald Thompson begins to see the hard science uncovered in the process.  The second book by Virgil Allen Moore in the Redgold Series is a companion to the main story. It reveals the actual science behind the vampires in his world. Down to the medial charts and lab work listed in the book. If you have ever wanted to know more about vampires, this book is for you. You can download it free on the author's blog. http://demonvampire.com/
author: Virgil Allen Moore
